description: We all know that&nbsp;summer is coming up, so it's time to start drinking light and thirst-quenching cocktails. Try Beautiful In Its Thyme; if you're looking for a drink that won't pack on the pounds, try It's About Thyme Cocktail!This&nbsp;low-calorie recipe includes&nbsp;vodka, thyme syrup, lime and lemon juice, and thyme garnish. The key here is to use fresh ingredients to get the most flavor out of your drink without adding extra calories. Trust us, this will be one of your favorite go-to drinks all season long!
keywords: How To Beautiful In Its Thyme
Beautiful In Its Thyme Cocktail Recipe
name: Beautiful In Its Thyme
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. Thyme Simple or Thyme Honey Syrup
Thyme sprigs and citrus wedges to garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Half-fill a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the vodka, thyme syrup, lemon juice, and lime juice and shake virtually for 10 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Double strain the mixture into a Collins glass and top with club soda.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with thyme sprigs and citrus wedges. Serve immediately.
